name: Patiant X
description:
Patiant X has been wounded, and there are zombies on the way!
You must defend your camp while supplying Patiant x with the what he needs to survive

Made during the 6th Extra Credits game jam, with the theme of: Take care

Credits: 

Me: Making the game overall

Brackeys (youtube): His awesome tutorials

enviroment, sound and character assets from the unity asset store
